column1: # This file contains OpenMS- and user-defined RNA modifications.
# It is read in addition to the Modomics data file ("Modomics.tsv") and uses the same format (except for the optional "alternatives" column).
# For terminal modifications, the "new_nomenclature" value has to end in "N" and contain either "33" (3'-terminal mod.) or "55" (5'-terminal mod.).

# An "ambiguous" modification represents two isobaric modifications with a methyl group on either the base or the ribose, that could be distinguished based on a-B ions. Its code ("short_name") must end in "?" and the codes of the two alternatives must be given in the last column.
5-(carboxyhydroxymethyl)uridine methyl ester or uridine 5-oxyacetic acid methyl ester
5-(carboxyhydroxymethyl)-2'-O-methyluridine methyl ester or 2'-O-methyluridine 5-oxyacetic acid methyl ester
